translation.en: We're the Pogues, and our mission this summer is to have a good time, all the time.
translation.ja: 俺たちは“ポーグ” 使命は夏を楽しむこと

translation.en: That's what, a three- story fall to the deck?
I give you about a one- in- three chance of survival.
- Should I do it? - Yeah, jump.
- I'll shoot you on the way down. - You'll shoot me?
- Yep. - Pow! They're gonna have Japanese toilets with towel warmers.
translation.ja: 日本の最新トイレが 設置されるみたい

translation.en: - Of course. Why wouldn't they? - This used to be a turtle habitat,

translation.en: but who cares about the turtles, I guess?

translation.en: - I can't have cold towels. - Can you please not kill yourself?

translation.en: Don't spill that beer. I'm not giving you another one.

- Of course you did. - Smooth.
- - A- plus.
Dumbass.

Humpty Dumpty, let's roll.
- Yeah. - Let's go, boys.
Gary, is that you?
- Get down. - It's me.
- Gary, good to see you, man! - Is it time?
- You're asking for it. - JJ!
- ♪ Watch his right hand slip... ♪ - Hey, stop!
Get 'em! They're comin' your way!
Hey! Stop!
- I got him! - Not much of a hugger!

- Get up, Pope, fatso's coming. - Hey!
Come here, you little pricks!
- - Bus is leaving!
Come on, boys! Whoo!
Hey, hey! Hey! Hey!

- Hey! - You're gonna give him a heart attack.

translation.en: You're so close! You can do it. There you go.

translation.en: - They don't pay you enough, bro. - JJ, stop. Stop.

translation.en: Oh, come on. That sort of initiative is just begging to be punished.
translation.ja: 上から叱られるだろうな

translation.en: - ♪ Oh, no ♪ -
The Outer Banks, Paradise on Earth.
It's the sort of place where you either have two jobs or two houses.
translation.ja: 労働者と 別荘持ちの金持ちが―

translation.en: Two tribes, one island.
All right. This is Figure Eight, the rich side of the island.
Home of the Kooks. So, guess where we don't live.
translation.ja: クークの地元だ 俺らに縁はない

translation.en: Whoo!
And then, this is the south side or the cut.
Home of the working class who make a living busing tables,
washing yachts, running charters.
translation.ja: 仕事はヨットの管理とか

translation.en: The natural habitat of... drumroll, please...
translation.ja: そしてここで暮らすのが…

translation.en: ...the Pogues.
That's us.
translation.ja: 俺たち“ポーグ”だ 〝ポーグ号〞

translation.en: - Pogues, pogies, the throwaway fish. -
translation.ja: 〝ポーグ号〞 ポーグは小魚の意味 食物連鎖の最下層 ポーグは小魚の意味 食物連鎖の最下層

translation.en: Lowest member of the food chain. Okay. So, the downside of Pogue life
translation.ja: ポーグは小魚の意味 食物連鎖の最下層 俺たちは 存在を無視されてる

translation.en: is we're ignored and neglected.
translation.ja: 俺たちは 存在を無視されてる

translation.en: But the upside of Pogue life? We're ignored and neglected,
translation.ja: だけど おかげさまで―

translation.en: which means we do whatever we want, whenever we want.
translation.ja: 俺たちは 思いのままに生きられる

translation.en: - Nice haul, dude. Look at that. - Ugh, John B.
translation.ja: 大漁だな さすがジョンＢ

translation.en: Been all bait for, like, three weeks.
- Gross. -
That's JJ, my best friend since the third grade.
translation.ja: こいつはＪＪ ３年生からの親友だ

translation.en: He's about as local as they come.
Latest in a long line of fishing, drinking,
smuggling, vendetta- holding salt- lifers who made their living off the water.
translation.ja: こいつは いつも海にいる

translation.en: Best surfer I know. Just don't tell him I said that.
Mild kleptomaniac and a future tax cheat.
translation.ja: あと 手癖が少々悪い

translation.en: - Do we have a name? - Hey!
- Hey. - Is this guy in prison?
- How has that not happened? - Come on.
Get off me. Don't even get me started on microplastic.
translation.ja: 放して マイクロプラスチックの話を 私に振ると長いよ

translation.en: Have you even heard about that island? That little island of just...
translation.ja: マイクロプラスチックの話を 私に振ると長いよ

translation.en: And that's Kiara, or Kie, as we call her.
- Oh, everything-- - When not saving turtles or listening to Marley, or getting a dolphin tattoo, she hangs out with us.
translation.ja: 趣味はカメの保護とレゲエ それ以外は俺らといる

translation.en: - - I'm not really sure why, though.
So, she's a rich kid, actually. - Foot in both worlds. - Stop, guys! My dad is gonna kill me.
translation.ja: キアラは金持ちの娘だ

translation.en: Her family owns The Wreck, this Outer Banks institution. Total cash cow with the tourists.
translation.ja: 両親が経営してる店は 観光客で大儲け

translation.en: You know, I'm not really sure how her parents feel about us.
translation.ja: 両親は俺らのこと嫌いかも

translation.en: - - We all have a thing for her.
translation.ja: みんなが気になる存在だ

translation.en: Get out.
And that's Pope, the brains of the operation...
translation.ja: ポープはチームの頭脳だ

translation.en: finalist for the Lucas T. Vanderhorst Merit Scholarship.
translation.ja: メリット･ベースの奨学生だ

translation.en: - And the smartest person I know. - Stop touching that.
translation.ja: マジで天才 触るな

translation.en: - I want to be a coroner. - What?
Little bit of a weirdo.
His father's this legendary character, Heyward.
translation.ja: 父親のヘイワードは有名人

translation.en: Anything you wanted on the island, Heyward could get for you.
translation.ja: 彼は何でも調達できる

translation.en: - Yeah. - Appreciate it.
Now, I'm not sure Heyward knew what to make of his oddball son,
translation.ja: 彼が息子を どう思ってるか知らないが

translation.en: but it didn't matter. He was a Pogue, just like the rest of us.
translation.ja: 彼が息子を どう思ってるか知らないが ポープも俺らの一員だ

translation.en: ♪ Baby ♪
So, that's my crew.
And that's me, John Booker Routledge.
translation.ja: これが俺　ジョンＢだ

translation.en: - Dude! Come on, man. Get outta here. -
And this is where I live.
- Morning, Kie. - Morning.
An old fish shack on the marsh. The Château, as my dad used to call it.
translation.ja: 古い釣り小屋だ 父は城と呼んでた

translation.en: There's Dad. He disappeared at sea nine months ago, looking for a shipwreck.
translation.ja: 父は９ヵ月前に海で消えた

translation.en: Who disappears at sea these days?
I miss him.
And then there's Mom. She split when I was three.
translation.ja: 俺が３歳の時 親は離婚

translation.en: Last I heard, she was in Colorado. I think it was Colorado.
translation.ja: 母は今 コロラドにいるらしい

translation.en: Uncle T!
That's Uncle T. Since Dad's vanished, he's supposedly my legal guardian.
translation.ja: 父が消えて おじが法的保護者になった

translation.en: At the moment, he's in Mississippi, building houses...
translation.ja: 今はミシシッピにいる

translation.en: - Hey. - Oy.
...which means it's just me right now, on my own, hangin' out with my friends.
translation.ja: つまり今は１人暮らし 友達と毎日を過ごしてる

translation.en: Three months after my dad was missing, he was officially presumed dead. I refused to sign the papers.
translation.ja: 父は認定死亡とされたが 俺は書類にサインしなかった

translation.en: Until I see a body, I'm not giving up.
translation.ja: 遺体を見るまで諦めない

translation.en: John, it's come to our attention
that you are an unemancipated minor living on your own.
No... No.
No.
I need honesty to help you. - That's what we want, right? - Yeah.
translation.ja: ジョン 正直に答えてちょうだい

translation.en: I'm being honest.
Okay, then when is the last time you spoke to your uncle?
translation.ja: 最後に おじさんと話したのは？

translation.en: Uh... 34 minutes ago.
When's the last time you saw him?
Two hours and... 43 minutes ago?
John, we're gonna come out there tomorrow to talk to your uncle.

translation.en: If he's not there, we're gonna move forward with foster care.

translation.en: I want to assure you, we're gonna find you a safe and loving home.
translation.ja: 温かい家族を探してあげる

translation.en: They actually thought I was gonna be happy to hear that.
And that's where this story starts.
translation.ja: まあ こういうことだ

translation.en: - - My dad missing, my uncle MIA,

translation.en: and the Bride of Frankenstein threatening foster care.

I need some sandbags over here!

Oh, man.
That's no good.
That is not good.
Oh, man.
- Agatha did some work, huh? - Yeah, she did.

I'm thinkin' that storm surge pushed all the crabs out on the marsh maze.

Nah, they're not gettin' on a ferry.

Still here.
- She totally looked at me. - I saw it.
- Dude, look at this place. -

translation.en: - Hard- core. - Phew.
- Hurricane surge. - Yeah.

Come on, man.
Your dad's a pussy. Over.
Oh, I heard that, you little bastard.
- We need your son. - Yeah, and island rules.

Pentagon, I think. We have security clearance.

Oh, top o' the mornin' to ya.
- Good morning. - Morning.
Whatcha got? You got some juice boxes?

A party trick.
Terrifying.
Hey, Pope. Can you go a little faster?

All right. All right!
- All right, you're done. - All right, stop!
- Jesus, Pope! -
- - You okay, JJ?
I think my heels touched the back of my head.
- - Kie, you okay?
- I'm all right. -
Pope, what did you do?
Sandbar. The channel changed.
No shit.
Ugh, this is probably gonna mess this whole place up.
- Hey, I saved the beer, though. - Congrats, JJ.

translation.en: Guys... I think there's a boat down there.
translation.ja: なあ ボートがある

translation.en: - Shut up. What? - No way.
No, no, guys. I'm serious. There's a boat down there. - For real. - Guys... is this...

Holy shit, he's right. Let's go.
You think there's a dead body down there?
- Guys, wait up! - Whoo!
- Get your ass in here! - Come on!
- You guys saw that? - Yeah.
- Yeah, I did. - Yeah.
That's a Grady- White. A new one of those is like 500 Gs, easy.
translation.ja: 高級ボートだ 新品だと50万ドルはする

translation.en: - Okay! - That's a primo rig.
Yeah. That's the boat I saw when I surfed the surge.
translation.ja: 嵐で波乗りした時に見た

translation.en: - Maybe it hit the jetty or something. - You surfed the surge?
translation.ja: 衝突したのか 嵐で波乗り？

translation.en: - Yeah. - That's my boy. Pogue style.
What the heck?
Wait, wait. Do we know whose boat that is?
No, but we're about to find out.
Dude, it's too deep.
Oh, for the weak and feeble, JJ.

translation.en: Well, I'm not resuscitating you. I'm just making that clear up front.

translation.en: That's fine.
- John B. - What?
- Diver down, fool. -
- Diver down.  - Yeah, he is.
Should we go get him?
- Oh, my God. That took forever! - Ah, jeez.
Any dead bodies?
- Looting potential? - No. No.
I found this motel key.
- A key. - Yes, a key, Pope.
Great! We salvaged a motel key.
Guys, we should report the wreck to the coast guard.

translation.en: - Maybe we'll get a finder's fee. - Yeah, and not work all summer.

translation.en: Thanks, Agatha, ya batch.
- You haven't seen him since? - Not since before the storm.

translation.en: What did the police say?
Well, they said I have to wait 24 hours before I can report anything,

translation.en: but I know something's wrong.
Nothing is wrong. You know, it's Scooter. He knows how to handle himself in a storm.

translation.en: Well, when was the last time that you saw him?

translation.en: Sarah!
- You seen the princess? - She's out back.
Let there be generators.
Thank God. It's like living in Nicaragua.

Be careful with that. Rose is gonna kill me.

Wheezie, there was a hurricane, sweetheart.

translation.en: No. No, no, no!
What is your sister doing?
Saving mice.
I'm sorry. Sarah!
- I'm busy! - What are you doing?

translation.en: The burrows filled with water from the surge.
The birds are having a field day.
The birds have to eat too, Sarah.
No, it's a mouse genocide out here. No!
The cycle of life is what it is, sweetheart. Now, come on.

translation.en: I can't be a part of it. First they came for the mice, Daddy.

translation.en: - I have a human being... - Oh, my God. - ...you might help. - Hi.

translation.en: You were storm prepping with him, right?
Yeah. He helped me latch the cabin on the Druthers.
- Last night? - Yeah.
And did he go out after that?
- From here? - Yeah.
- No. Are you crazy? There was a hurricane. - Well, did he say where he was going?

translation.en: He didn't say anything to me.
- I'm so sorry. Is he okay? - He's absolutely okay.
- I hope so. - He's hunkered down somewhere.

How about the Humane Society?
He's diabetic!

translation.ja: “気をつけて 下のジョンもちょうだい” さっさとヤれよ

translation.en: Bro, you know the rule. No Pogue- on- Pogue macking.
translation.ja: 仲間とはヤらないし お前が狙ってるだろ

translation.en: - You're the one always hitting on her. - Of course I'm hitting on her.
translation.ja: 仲間とはヤらないし お前が狙ってるだろ 当たり前だ セクシーな金持ち娘だ

translation.en: She's a super- hot, rich, hippie chick slumming with us.
translation.ja: 当たり前だ セクシーな金持ち娘だ

translation.en: Why? I can't figure it out either, but who cares, bro?
translation.ja: 何で俺らと つるんでるのかな

translation.en: I know that door's locked because I've tried it. Have you?
translation.ja: でもキアラはガードが堅い

translation.en: - - You need help.
Not a little help, you need a lot of help.
It's like every girl who just has a heartbeat, you're like... Uhh!
translation.ja: 女なら誰でもいいんだろ

translation.en: - What? It's not a big deal. - Is that us? Twenty- nine.
- This is it. - Okay.
Housekeeping.
- Should we try it? - Yeah.
No power. No security cameras. No one's gonna know.
translation.ja: 防犯カメラも動いてない 大丈夫だ

translation.en: Okay.
Check the bag. See if there's a name on there somewhere.
translation.ja: バッグを調べろ 名前があるかも

translation.en: - A jacket. - Denim slides.
No name on the jacket.
- It's a nice jacket, though. - Definitely over 50.
translation.ja: 名前は書いてない 50歳以上だな ニューバランスだ

translation.en: He's got New Balances.
translation.ja: 50歳以上だな ニューバランスだ

translation.en: Yo, dude, come here. Maybe this is where they were fishing.
translation.ja: 来いよ 釣りの場所だ

translation.en: - Let me see. - Right there.
No, that's off the continental shelf.
- That's Big Swell. Nobody fishes there. - Okay.
- Coffee? - Yeah.
Standard. Tissues for when you get lonely...
translation.ja: 寂しいときのティッシュ

translation.en: - Ooh! - Did you find anything?
A really awesome Dopp kit you won't let me steal.
Yeah, 'cause we're not stealing shit.
- One, one, one. -
- Biggest pet peeve? - Yeah.
Easy. Giving one percent to the environment.
- What's wrong with that? - We only have one Earth, Pope.
translation.ja: 何で？ 地球は１つしかない 100％還元すべきよ

translation.en: We should be giving it 100 percent, bare minimum.
translation.ja: 地球は１つしかない 100％還元すべきよ

translation.en: Right. That's not fiscally sound.
translation.ja: でも経済が成り立たない

translation.en: Neither is destroying the planet we have to live on.
Hey, hey, cops.
- Shit. - Call them.
I can't. Towers are down.
If I lose my merit scholarship, I'm gonna kill someone.
translation.ja: 奨学金を失ったらヤバい

translation.en: - Maybe they're not going up. Maybe-- - Okay.
translation.ja: 部屋には入らないだろう

translation.en: - Maybe they're looking for a room. - They're going up.
- One, one, one, two. -
Punching shit at random. That will... definitely work.
translation.ja: ランダムか　名案だな

translation.en: - Wait a second. Here. -
I don't know. I don't know about the second one.
These coordinates, they...
Wait. My cousin said you could catch swordfish here.
translation.ja: メカジキが 釣れるって聞いた

translation.en: - Six, one, six, six, six. - Nah, that wouldn't make any sense.
- What about a surf spot? -  That could possibly be it.
translation.ja: サーフスポットなら あり得るかも

translation.en: - Or shoals. -
- Holy shit. - Is this a surf spot?
translation.ja: すげえ 砂州のサーフスポット？

translation.en: - Have you heard of shoals? -
translation.ja: 砂州のサーフスポット？

translation.en: - Uh... JJ? - Hm?
You're gonna want to see this.
- Okay, do something. Do something. - Go, go.
- Stand back. - Okay. You got it.
translation.ja: 下がって 頼むわよ

translation.en: Didn't you ever play baseball?
- Dude! - I was on the math team.
- Dude, dude, dude! - You grabbed the gun.
- This is a SIG Sauer. - Put the gun back, JJ!
This is a fucking spendy gatt, man. Just... Bam! Bam!
- Bam! Bam! - Hey, think about it!
- Bam! Bam! - We are not stealing anything.
You want a free mattress?
- A mathlete? - You know what?
Now, here is Scooter Grubbs' luxury suite.
- Just take a pic of me. Right here. - You want me to take a picture of you?
translation.ja: 写真を撮って お前の？

translation.en: Yeah, dude, like...
Make our own incriminating evidence? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.ja: 犯罪の証拠写真を残す気か？

translation.en: Get your free lamp.
- Wait, what was that? - What?
Cops. Cops! Cops!
Twenty- eight, 29.
- Shit. - What is it?
- Cops. -
Kildare County Sheriff's Department!
translation.ja: キルデア郡保安局です

translation.en: Should we peel?
You never leave a Pogue behind.
No, seriously, should we peel?
Maybe.
Go ahead and check the bathroom.
Yes, sir.
It's clear.
What are you guys doing?
Oh, my God.
I said it. Didn't I say it?
Go ahead. Throw these in a bag, would you?
translation.ja: これをバッグに入れとけ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Sir?
Everybody's gotta dip their beak.
What the f--
- Right, right. Their beak. - Yeah.
- - Do you believe...
This is... Wow.
Yeah... Um...
All right. Let's go.
No one's here.
Well, that was fun.
- Could have warned us sooner. - We would have,
- except Pope was on the math team. - You were on the math team?
translation.ja: ポープが 数学クラブだったせい 数学？

translation.en: The cops took everything like it was a crime scene.
translation.ja: 警察が全部持ってった

translation.en: Did you guys find anything?
Did we find anything? No, I don't think so. Oh, yeah, we did.
translation.ja: 何も見つけてない あれ？

translation.en: - What the hell? - Dude, what?
- Dude, chill. Come on. - Why take that from a crime scene?
translation.ja: 落ち着け 現場から盗るな

translation.en: - Better than cops having it. - You serious?
- I'm gonna lose my merit scholarship. - Hey, hey, hey. Sh, sh, sh. sh, sh.
At least you have us, right?
I'm living the nightmare.
So, what happened?
Well, I was up at the Mason Outlet,
and, uh, I seen this lump,
and the crabs was just goin' to town on it, you know?
translation.ja: カニが集まってきてた

translation.en: So, I figured the best thing to do was, uh... throw him over in the ice chest
translation.ja: とりあえず氷で冷やしといた

translation.en: - and then call y'all. - Six- seven. Call the ME.
I never saw anything like that before.
translation.ja: あんなのは初めて見た

translation.en: Scooter?
Scooter? Oh, God!
translation.ja: スクーター　ウソでしょ

translation.en: Who's that?
It's Scooter Grubbs. He was out during the storm.
translation.ja: スクーターよ 嵐の中 海に出てた

translation.en: Check out this pic I got.
Dead body.
Insane.
Holy shit.
What kind of boat did he have?
Somehow, that dirtbag copped a brand- new Grady- White.
translation.ja: 超高級ボートらしいよ

translation.en: Everyone's out looking for it.
Okay. So, um... we didn't see anything.
translation.ja: 俺たちは何も見てないし

translation.en: We don't know anything.
We need to have total and complete amnesia.
Actually, Pope's right for once.
translation.ja: ポープの意見も一理ある

translation.en: See, I agree with you sometimes.
Deny, deny, deny.
Guys, we can't keep that money.
Okay. Not all of us can afford unlimited data plans, Kiara.
translation.ja: 君と違って裕福じゃない

translation.en: We have to pass that off to Lana Grubbs. Otherwise, it's bad karma.
translation.ja: 奥さんのラナに渡さないと 呪われる

translation.en: Bad karma to be implicated in a felony, too.
We gotta go dark.
If that means we get to keep the money, then I agree.
translation.ja: せめてカネだけは 取っておこう

translation.en: I don't agree.
- What? Why? - Just think about it.
This is Scooter Grubbs we're talking about.
Same dude that's buying individual cigarettes at the Porthole.
translation.ja: タバコを１本ずつ買う奴だ

translation.en: Shit, one time I saw this dude begging for change in the Save- A- Lot parking lot because he needed gas.
translation.ja: ガソリン代が足りなくて 小銭をせがんでた

translation.en: We're talking about a dirtbag marina rat who's never had more than 40 bucks in his pocket,
translation.ja: 手持ちで40ドルもない男が 高級ボートを持てるか？

translation.en: and all of a sudden, he's got a Grady- White? Just sayin'.
translation.ja: 手持ちで40ドルもない男が 高級ボートを持てるか？ 考えて

translation.en: All right, so think about it, Pope. How does a marina rat get a Grady- White?
translation.ja: 貧乏人が 高級ボートを買う方法は？

translation.en: - Prostitution. - Square groupers, bro.
Okay, flying under the radar, no aerial surveillance. They don't do that stuff during a hurricane.
translation.ja: 嵐の時はレーダー探知も 空中査察もない

translation.en: What does that mean? JJ?
- They were straight smugglin'. - Smugglin'.
And I guarantee there's a serious amount of contraband
translation.ja: ボートには 相当な量のヤクがあるはず

translation.en: - in that wreck. - Hell, yeah.
translation.ja: ボートには 相当な量のヤクがあるはず だろうね

translation.en: Fish on!
For the record, if that is a smuggling ship
with illegal contraband on the inside of it... - Mm- hm? - ...it probably belongs to someone else.
translation.ja: 積んである禁制品は 誰かの物だ

translation.en: - Minor details. - They could come looking for it.
translation.ja: だから？ 探しにくるはずだ

translation.en: Taking it would be catastrophically stupid.
translation.ja: それを取るのは自殺行為だ

translation.en: Right. Well, stupid things have good outcomes all the time.
translation.ja: リスクを冒してこそ デカい見返りが手に入る

translation.en: All we need to do is figure out a way to get into the cargo hold of that wreck.
translation.ja: ボートに入る方法を 考えつくまでは

translation.en: Until then, we just lay low. Just act normal.
- - Right. And how exactly do we do that?
- Kegger? -
- Tally- ho. - Hey- up.
- No. Hell, no. - I'll take it!
- Chug it! Chug it! - ♪ So, girl, don't act so surprised ♪
You can't understand the Outer Banks without understanding the boneyard. It's kinda like a three- layer burrito.
translation.ja: アウターバンクスの若者は ゴミ捨て場に集まる

translation.en: Yo, what's up, homie?
- What's up, man? - What's goin' on?
There's us and our friends, the working- class derelicts.
translation.ja: まずは労働者階級の仲間たち

translation.en: Yeah.
- Hey, hey. - Hey.
Then, there are the Kooks, the rich second- homers.
translation.ja: そして金持ち連中のクーク

translation.en: They're mostly from poncey- ass boarding schools, just rich trustafarian posers.
translation.ja: 全寮制の私立に通う 嫌味な奴ら

translation.en: Our natural enemies.
And then, there are the Tourons.
Want a beer?
Totally clueless. Here for a week on vacation with their families.
translation.ja: 家族旅行に来てる 無知な人たち

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey, you, uh... you want a beer?
Chum for the sharks.
We are family!
If you treat me.
- Oh, really? - Yeah.
Virgos are, like, so organized.
Like, all my friends that are Virgos are like--
It's kinda weird when on TV, we see people die,
translation.ja: テレビの死体はウソくさい

translation.en: and they just kinda sit there, but in actuality,
translation.ja: テレビの死体はウソくさい 実際の死体は ウンコを漏らしてる

translation.en: they would be shitting and farting up a storm.
translation.ja: 実際の死体は ウンコを漏らしてる

translation.en: - ...you read about... - Sarah! Sarah, be careful, okay?
- What is she doing here? - It's so... Huh?
That's Sarah Cameron. Kook princess.
Kiara's best friend in the ninth grade, worst enemy in the tenth grade.
translation.ja: キアラとは 高１で仲違いした

translation.en: I work on her dad's boats, so, you know, I've seen her around.
translation.ja: サラの父親は俺の顧客だ

translation.en: What are you doing?
Then that's Topper, her not so pleasant boyfriend.
translation.ja: あれはトッパー サラの彼氏だ

translation.en: Topper actually thinks Pogues were bred to mow lawns.
translation.ja: ポーグをバカにしてる

translation.en: Sorry, museum's closed.
Yeah, sure, chief. I'll be just a minute.
The Royal Merchant sunk in the great storm of 1829
translation.ja: ロイヤル･マーチャント号は 1829年に沈没しました

translation.en: with $400 million of British government gold onboard.
translation.ja: ４億ドルの金(きん)を積んだまま…

translation.en: The dream of generations of islanders.
- Yeah. Huh. - Lovely work, don't you think?
Mm- hm. Yeah. Lovely.
Let's go.
- - How you doing?
- John B. - What're you doing?
translation.ja: よう ジョンＢ 何してる？

translation.en: - Yo, what's up? - I got this for you.
- Want it? - For me? Yeah, I'll take a sip.
translation.ja: お前にやるよ ひと口もらう

translation.en: - Hi. - Oh, wait. Hey, hey. Hey, Sarah!
translation.ja: 待て おい サラ

translation.en: Sarah, can I interest you in a tasty Milwaukee beverage?
translation.ja: ミルウォーキー名物に 興味ない？

translation.en: No, thanks.
- Is it not fancy enough for you? - No. We were just leaving.
Hey, you know what? I'll take it.
- I'll-- Thank you, man. I appreciate it. - That's nice, but I didn't ask you.
translation.ja: ありがとう お前には渡さない

translation.en: If you said pretty please, maybe,
- but you didn't. - Oh, pretty please.
- Yeah. Sarah. - Pretty please? You can have it.
- She doesn't want it, you-- - Okay.
translation.ja: 要らないって言ってんだろ

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
- You're so funny, man. - Hey.
- Dirty Pogues! -
- Oh! - John B.
translation.ja: ジョンＢ 静かにする約束だろ

translation.en: - We're supposed to be incognito, remember? - Babe, babe, babe, babe--
translation.ja: ジョンＢ 静かにする約束だろ ダメよ

translation.en: Guys? Guys!
Chill!
Hey, John B, don't make me drown you like your old man, all right?
translation.ja: お前の親父みたいに 溺れたいか？

translation.en: Fight! Fight! Fight! Fight!
- Give it to him! - John B, let it go!
Stop, you guys!
Topper! Stop!
Come on, John B!
Fight! Fight! Fight! Fight!
- That's what I'm talkin' about! - Come on!
- Come on! - Yeah, you wanna go?
Stop!
John B!
Oh! Topper!
Come on, Topper!
Let's go!
Come on!
Oh, my God.
Come on, man!
Topper!
Topper, stop! No!
No!
- I know. - He's drowning him.
Topper!
Yeah, you know what that is.
Your move, broski.
- Come on. Chill, dude! - JJ!
- Chill! - Stop! JJ!
- Put the gun down. - Did you say somethin', princess?
translation.ja: 下ろして 何か言った？

translation.en: - We're good. We're good. - Put the gun down!
All right? Come on, man!
Kie! Can you check your psycho friend, please?
translation.ja: キアラ 説得してよ

translation.en: Okay, everyone, listen up! Get the hell off our side of the island!
translation.ja: みんな よく聞け 俺らの陣地に入ってくるな

translation.en: - Are you crazy? You idiot! - Stupid!
translation.ja: 正気か？ 何で銃を出した？

translation.en: - Why do that? - It's not worth it!
- I'm saving his life, okay? - Stupid!
- You're gonna jeopardize everything! -
translation.ja: ヤバいことになったぞ

translation.en: There's something about my father I haven't mentioned.
The week before he went missing, he says to me, Bird, I think I found something.
translation.ja: “あるものを見つけた”と 言っていた

translation.en: Your Uncle T's gonna come stay for a while. I might have to vanish for a bit.
translation.ja: “少し姿を消すが ティーおじさんが来る”

translation.en: So, he talks about vanishing,
and he vanishes.
Everyone says he was lost at sea, but...
translation.ja: 海の事故と言われるが…

translation.en: he's still out there. I know it.
Get decent, sweetie. We need to talk.
translation.ja: 行儀よくね 話がある

translation.en: Sorry to break in like this, but DCS called. They wanted me to check on you. See how you're doin'.
translation.ja: 児童相談所から 様子を見ろって言われてね

translation.en: So, how are you, besides the--
Oh, no, I'm-- I'm great. Yeah, fantastic. Uh...
translation.ja: いや 絶好調ですよ

translation.en: Thanks for comin' by.
I'm so glad to hear you say that, John B, but I heard a few things that worried me.
translation.ja: それはよかったけど 気になる話があってね

translation.en: Let me see if I can remember.
Oh, yeah.
One of the things I heard was that your Uncle Teddy, your guardian,
translation.ja: 法的保護者のおじさんが―

translation.en: hasn't been in the state for three months.
- That's false. - You don't have to say anything.
translation.ja: ウソだ 事実よ　学校にも連絡した

translation.en: I know it's true. I called the school.
translation.ja: 事実よ　学校にも連絡した

translation.en: They said you used to be a good student, but now you're failin' all your classes.
translation.ja: 前は優秀だったのに 単位を落としてる

translation.en: No. No, I'm only failing one, and it's history.
translation.ja: 歴史だけだ 先生がクソで

translation.en: - He's a dick. He's out for me-- - I heard
translation.ja: 先生がクソで 昨日はビーチで ケンカがあったとか

translation.en: there was a fight on the beach yesterday,
translation.ja: 昨日はビーチで ケンカがあったとか

translation.en: - and a gun was involved. - Okay. Gun?
translation.ja: 誰かが銃を出した 銃？

translation.en: No.
Did I get in a dustup? Yes, but was there a gun?
translation.ja: ケンカはしたけど銃は…

translation.en: No. No way.
That's okay. I know who it was. I'll get to him.
translation.ja: 本人に聞くから別にいいわ

translation.en: All I'm worried about right now is makin' sure you're in a safe home.
translation.ja: あなたの身が心配なだけ

translation.en: Yeah, super safe. - Super sound, sturdy. You know? -
translation.ja: ここは安全だ 何の問題もない

translation.en: - Uncle T's coming, so... - That what he told you?
translation.ja: おじも戻る そうなの？

translation.en: - Yeah. - If he is coming, I think you should be allowed to stay.
translation.ja: 事実なら ここにいればいい

translation.en: Thank you.
But if I stick my neck out for you, you have to help me.
translation.ja: その代わり私に協力して

translation.en: Tit for tat.
What-- what does tat mean?
Let me see, how can you help me? Oh, I know.
So, a body was found in the marsh yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日 沼地で死体があがった

translation.en: Were you in the marsh yesterday?
- Yeah, we were fishin' for some drum. - You catch anything?
translation.ja: 釣りをしてた 収穫は？

translation.en: Nah, we were skunked.
Strange. Fishing's usually good after a storm. All sorts of things get stirred up.
translation.ja: 普通 嵐のあとは 釣れるはずなんだけどね

translation.en: You come across a wreck yesterday?
No.
You skimmin' just above the surface, John B.
translation.ja: あんたはギリギリを泳いでる

translation.en: Now, down here is foster care, juvie.
translation.ja: ちょっと落ちれば 里親が待ってる

translation.en: Pretty big drop for a smart kid like you.
translation.ja: それは避けたいでしょ

translation.en: Up here is you and your little friends doing whatever you want.
translation.ja: ここに行けば 友達と好きに生きられる

translation.en: Outer Banks...
or foster care on the mainland.
You one inch above the surface, John B.
translation.ja: 紙一重のところにいる

translation.en: If I was you, I'd start flappin' my wings.
translation.ja: 私なら賢い選択をするわ

translation.en: Now, you sure you didn't come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.ja: 本当にボートを見てない？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
It's better if you didn't, you understand?
translation.ja: 見てないなら よかった

translation.en: I'm gonna look the other way, as long as you stay out of the marsh.
translation.ja: 沼地に近づかないなら 里親の件は見逃す

translation.en: I got dogs livin' better than this, John B.
translation.ja: うちの犬小屋のほうがマシね

translation.en: You might wanna think about cleanin' up.
Look, I'm callin' it off. All right?
Peterkin said, if I stay out of the marsh, she'll help me with DCS.
translation.ja: 沼に近づかなければ 里子に出されない

translation.en: - And you believed her? - Yes, I believe her, JJ.
translation.ja: 信じるの？ ああ 信じる

translation.en: An actual cop, John B. You believed a cop.
All I gotta do is stay out of the marsh for a couple days, and she'll help me out.
translation.ja: 彼女は俺を助けてくれる

translation.en: It doesn't help that your ass was the one shooting a gun.
You know what I should have done? Just let Topper drown your ass.
translation.ja: 溺れさせればよかった

translation.en: - Topper was gonna drown me? - Sure looked like it.
translation.ja: 俺が溺れる？ そうだよ

translation.en: - Funny. - Have you looked in a mirror?
translation.ja: 鏡を見た？ もっと言えよ

translation.en: - Tell me some more. Come on. - They always win, don't they, man?
translation.ja: もっと言えよ いつもそうだ

translation.en: Kooks versus Pogues. They always, always win!
translation.ja: 結局 クークがいつも勝つ

translation.en: - Goddamn! - Look, it's okay!
No, it's not okay!
It is not! They don't want us to go down into the marsh.
translation.ja: 沼に近づくなということは

translation.en: That means there's something valuable down there, and you know it.
I know you do. And I understand why you don't wanna go.
translation.ja: だろ？ お前は失うものがデカいから 渋るのは分かるし

translation.en: You're the golden boy. You got way too much to risk. And you--
translation.ja: お前は失うものがデカいから 渋るのは分かるし

translation.en: I mean, you're already rich as fuck anyway. Why would you bother?
translation.ja: あんたはカネに困ってない

translation.en: But you and me, man, we got nothin' to lose!
translation.ja: でもお前と俺は 失うものなんてないんだ

translation.en: - We really don't, all right? - JJ.
translation.ja: ＪＪ 今までは違っただろうけど…

translation.en: And I know it didn't use to be that way for you.
translation.ja: 今までは違っただろうけど…

translation.en: I don't want to talk about this. I don't want to talk about it.
translation.ja: 聞きたくない もうよせ

translation.en: - So that's it? - Just get out of my way, bro.
John B, listen to me. I have a plan.
You got the key to Cameron's big boat, right? - No. - There's scuba gear.
translation.ja: サラの親父の船に スキューバがある

translation.en: We borrow that, and then we go down to the wreck this afternoon, and that is what's gonna save you, man.
translation.ja: それで捜索に行って お宝をゲットするんだ

translation.en: You don't see rich kids going into foster care, do you?
translation.ja: カネがあれば里親は不要だ

translation.en: You know, I should have learned a long time ago to never listen to JJ.
translation.ja: ＪＪの話に乗るなんて バカげてる

translation.en: He's full of bad ideas, like stealing from my rich boss.
translation.ja: 顧客の船から 物を盗むだなんて

translation.en: - But this time, he was right. - ♪ Only dem alon invited ♪
- I had nothing to lose. - ♪ Karina and Sabrina ♪
My dad said the island was America on steroids.
translation.ja: 島はアメリカの縮図だ

translation.en: The haves and have- nots like anyplace, but magnified and multiplied.
translation.ja: 持つ者と持たざる者の世界 父の言葉だ

translation.en: The way I see it, the game's rigged. Maybe it always has been.
translation.ja: 元々 出来レースに思える

translation.en: - No parents, money... - Cheers! ...and no one looking out for me, I got no chance...
translation.ja: 親もカネもない俺に 勝ち目はないから…

translation.en: - ♪ Up inna har belly weh mi sen it ♪ - ...unless I make it on my own.
- ♪ Me bad her up ♪ - Oh! Hey.
Are you stalking us? Plotting your revenge?
Yeah. Why don't you just tell your daddy I blew the bilge on Druthers?
translation.ja: お父さんの船を壊すとでも？

translation.en: Everything's good to go. Just toppin' off these tanks.
translation.ja: メンテは完璧 あとはガソリンだ

translation.en: Hey, are you okay?
'Cause that eye of yours looks really gnarly.
You know what? You can tell Topper he won the first round.
translation.ja: 今回はトッパーの勝ちでいい

translation.en: I'll get him next time.
So there's just gonna be a reign of terror on this island now?
translation.ja: 島で内戦勃発ってわけ？

translation.en: Wars have been started for less, Sarah Cameron.
Okay. Can we drop the whole Pogues versus Kooks thing?
translation.ja: ポーグとクークの対決は やめにしない？

translation.en: It is really stupid.
You know, it's easy to say when you're a Kook.
Are y'all ready for a water party today?
translation.ja: さあ 今日はパーティーだ

translation.en: All right. Now, all kiddin' aside,
your job today is to help keep privates off the marsh
translation.ja: 今日は沼地に人を入れるな

translation.en: so we can do our job and find this wreck.
translation.ja: ボートの捜索をするためだ

translation.en: That's straight from Sheriff Peterkin.
Do not forget your sunscreen, ladies. Bring a lot of liquids.
translation.ja: 日焼け止めと 水分補給を忘れずに

translation.en: Does that include Natty Light?
I don't care what swill you bring. That's on your own recognizance.
translation.ja: 水分の定義は 各々の判断に任せる

translation.en: All right. What else do you got to worry about?
translation.ja: よし もういいな　出発だ

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.ja: もういいな　出発だ

translation.en: Pull that for me, will you? Thank you, ma'am.
translation.ja: 正面に引いて　どうも

translation.en: Bill, I'mma get at ya about that tomorrow, all right?
- We're here about the missing boat. - Yeah?
- What can I do for you fellas? - Associates of the owner.
translation.ja: どちら様？ 持ち主の友人です

translation.en: - Here to help however we can. - Uh- huh. Right.
We're devastated about Scooter. We just feel sick about it.
translation.ja: スクーターのことは ショックですよ

translation.en: You mind if we join your armada? Take a look for ourselves?
translation.ja: 私たちも捜索を手伝いたい

translation.en: Yeah, why not? Extra set of eyes.
translation.ja: そいつはありがたいな

translation.en: We'll let you know if we find anything, Officer.
translation.ja: 見つけたら連絡します

translation.en: - You do that. -
- This is empty. You took empty tanks? - I...
translation.ja: このタンク 空っぽよ

translation.en: Okay, this one's a quarter full.
It's enough for one of us.
Love it when a plan comes together.
Does anybody know how to dive?
- Anybody? - It's kind of a Kook sport.
translation.ja: ねえ？ クークのスポーツだ

translation.en: - - I... read about it.
Great, Pope read about it, so someone's gonna die.
Look, y- you put the thing in your mouth and breathe. How hard could it be?
translation.ja: それで呼吸すればいいんだろ 楽勝だ

translation.en: If you come up too fast, nitrogen gets into your blood, and you get the bends.
translation.ja: 浮上が速すぎると 減圧症になる

translation.en: - Bends like, bend over and... - The bends kill you.
translation.ja: 減圧症って？ 最悪 死ぬ

translation.en: - Right. - I can-- I can dive.
- You can dive. I'm cool with that. - Since when can you dive?
I'll do it. It's fine.
- Let me do some calculations real quick. - You serious?
translation.ja: 計算しとこう 本気？

translation.en: - That boat's about 30 feet down. - Okay.
So it'll take 25 minutes at that depth.
Twenty- five.
Which means you need to make your safety stop at about... ten feet.
All right? For two minutes.
Yeah, yeah. Ten feet, two minutes. Got it.
- Uh... - What was that all about?
I don't know, but I liked it. A lot.
translation.ja: さあ　でも気に入った

translation.en: - All righty. - Yeah. Uh, when you--
translation.ja: よし 潜ったら船倉を探せ

translation.en: uh, when you're down there, you look for the cargo hold.
You stick this thing inside and twist and pull, okay?
translation.ja: 穴に差したら回して引け

translation.en: - Stick in, twist, pull. - Yeah.
- My dad moved weight back in the day. - Who didn't?
translation.ja: 親父が運び屋で そう

translation.en: Hey! I tied my T- shirt to the anchor chain about ten feet down.
translation.ja: ３メートル地点に Ｔシャツを結んだ

translation.en: It's where you need to do your safety stop.
- Cool. - Keep an eye on this.
translation.ja: 助かる 減圧するための 酸素を残しとけ

translation.en: You need to make sure you have enough air to decompress.
translation.ja: 減圧するための 酸素を残しとけ

translation.en: Okay, how much do I need?
Unclear. Breathe as little as possible.
translation.ja: さあ　とにかく酸素を大切に

translation.en: Zen. Think Zen, you know?
- - Yeah. Got it.
Hey, if we get caught in the marsh, we're basically screwed, so...
translation.ja: 見つかったらマズいから そろそろ始めよう

translation.en: - better get a move on. - Copy that.
translation.ja: 見つかったらマズいから そろそろ始めよう 了解

translation.en: Diver down?
Diver down.
Diver down.
- All right. - See ya, dude.
Shit. JJ.
Guys, that's the police.
Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
- Yep, that's the police. - Just act frickin' normal.
translation.ja: 警察が来る 平静を装うのよ

translation.en: - Evening, officers. - Evening.
- Here. - Evening.
JJ, tie it off.
How you kids doing? You know the marsh is closed?
translation.ja: 沼は閉鎖だと知ってるだろ

translation.en: - No. - No. Wow.
- I didn't know that. - Why-- why is it closed?
translation.ja: 初耳です なぜです？

translation.en: Well, we're conducting a search out here. Boat went down.
translation.ja: 沈んだボートの捜索だよ

translation.en: - Oh. - Seen anything?
- No. - No boats. No.
translation.ja: いいえ 見てません

translation.en: Where's your friend you always hang with? He here?
translation.ja: いつも一緒にいる友達は？

translation.en: He's working.
I'm gonna check your little boat out.
- Yeah. - Yeah, hop aboard.
- You wanna check-- uh, check her out. - Thank you.
- Uh... you got another one? - Yeah.
- Yeah, yeah. - Of course. It's, uh... it's in the hold.
translation.ja: あります 船倉の中に

translation.en: - Yeah. - Show him.
Yeah, here we go.
- All right. - Yeah.
- Uh... - Be careful.  Be careful. You don't wanna slip.
translation.ja: 滑りやすいので気をつけて

translation.en: All right.
- All right. - All right.
- Beautiful day. - Sure is.
- Very. - Let us know
translation.ja: 本当に 何か見かけたら 知らせてくれ

translation.en: if you see anything on your way out.
translation.ja: 何か見かけたら 知らせてくれ

translation.en: - Will do. Will do. -
- We'll be gone soon, sir. - Yes, you will.
translation.ja: すぐ帰ります 頼んだよ

translation.en: He's definitely out of air.
- There he is! - Oh, God! Jesus Christ!
- Don't scare us like that! - How'd it go down there?
Did you find anything?
Did I find anything?
Yeah, there we go! That's my boy!
Jeez, dude!
- Dude! - Oh!
- You okay? - Yeah, I ran out of air.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 酸素不足で

translation.en: You scared the shit out of me.
Yeah, the cops were up here, but, uh... took care of 'em.
- My bad. - You're all good.
Yeah, you kinda missed the show, brother.
- Hey, guys? Guys, bogey, two o'clock. - What?
translation.ja: ねえ ２時の方向を見て 何だ？

translation.en: - Do you recognize that boat? - I've never seen it.
translation.ja: あの船は？ 何だろ？　沼は閉鎖なのに

translation.en: What are they doing here? The marsh is closed.
translation.ja: 何だろ？　沼は閉鎖なのに

translation.en: Let's not stick around and find out.
- JJ, get the bowline. - Yeah.
- Should we wait on 'em? - No, we're not.
translation.ja: 待つ？ バカ言うな　急げ

translation.en: - Go get the stern. Go! - Are you joking? JJ, hurry up.
translation.ja: バカ言うな　急げ 早く ＪＪ 急いで

translation.en: - Guys, don't wait for me. Go. - Let's go!
translation.ja: 先に行ってくれ 行くよ

translation.en: Pull out the stern.
- I don't like this. - Are they coming for us?
Maybe they're fishing.
- Go, go, go, go! - Go into the marsh.
- Let's go! - I'm going. Act natural.
translation.ja: 早く ああ 落ち着け

translation.en: Hey, guys, they're following us.
- This can't be good. - Shit.
Dude, you gotta go faster!
- I'm going! - Gun it!
- What the... - Holy shit!
John B, get down!
We're gonna die!
Shit! Pope, move.
- - Get down, Kie!
- Oh, my God! Whoo! - Whew!
Booyeah! Pogue god, man!
- See you, guys! - That was insane!
Oh, God.
- What do you think it is? - Gotta be money, right?
translation.ja: 何かな？ きっとカネだ

translation.en: That or a couple of keys with street value to the low- to mid- mils!
translation.ja: 大金につながる鍵かも

translation.en: - Can we please just open the bag? - Wow, Pope.
translation.ja: 早く開けろよ ポープ

translation.en: That's a rare outburst of emotion.
translation.ja: 怒鳴るなんて珍しいな

translation.en: Okay. You guys are literally killing me with anticipation. - Open the bag. - Jeez.
translation.ja: じらさないで さっさと開けてくれ

translation.en: We almost died over this.
Oh, wow. Yup. That's about right.
translation.ja: マジかよ こうきたか

translation.en: Good job, everybody. We found a compass.
translation.ja: お疲れ コンパスかよ

translation.en: Dude, what? It's not worth anything.
This was my father's.
